modName: The Skillful Chef - Cooking Pots and Ovens give Skill
summary: Cooking Pots and Ovens give increase to player.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red][size=4]The Skillful Chef - Cooking Pots and Ovens give skill[/size][/color]
By - UWShocks
========================================================================================
Requires: [color=yellow]HEARTHFIRES DLC[/color]
--Mod does not add scripts, so you can remove without worry of orphaned scripts.
========================================================================================
[color=red]Why?[/color]
--I wanted a mod that allowed the player to gain experience when cooking food; especially useful when
using a "Needs Mod" like "Imps More Complex Needs" or "Realistic Needs&Diseases [RND]".
--However, most "Cooking Skill" mods only applied Alchemy Skills towards cooking pots; none existed for Ovens.
--Thus, I created this mod to apply "Alchemy Skills" to the various "Cooking Pots/Spits" and "Ovens".
========================================================================================
[color=red]Compatibility:[/color]
--Should be compatible with most mods. Not compatible with mods that directly alter Cooking Pots/Spits or Ovens.
--Most mods that add new "Food Recipes" do NOT alter the cooking-pots nor ovens; thus a majority of food mods
should be compatible.
========================================================================================
[color=red]Permissions:[/color]
--Do whatever you want with this mod. All I ask is credit for my work if you do use it.
author: UWShocks
